Title: Enacts "Charlotte's Law" relating to the permanent termination of licenses of persistent vehicle and traffic law violators
Summary: Enacts "Charlotte's Law"; relates to the permanent termination of licenses of persistent vehicle and traffic law violators who have been convicted of certain violations three times in a 25 year period.
LawCode: Amd Art 20 Art Head, §§1146 & 511, add §510-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting "Charlotte's Law" relating to the termination of driving privileges of persistent vehicle and traffic law violators
